Verses: 1 naan En Kangalai Ereduththup Paarththapodhu, Idho, Than Kaiyile Alavunool Pidiththirundha Oru Purushanaik Kanden.
2 neer Evvidaththukkup Pogireer Endru Ketten; Adharku Avar: Erusalemin Agalam Ivvalavu Endrum Adhin Neelam Ivvalavu Endrum Ariyumpadi Adhai Alakkiradharkup Pogiren Endraar.
3 idho, Ennodepesina Thoodhan Purappattapodhu, Veroru Thoodhan Avarai Sandhikkumpadip Purappattuvandhaan.

4 ivanai Avar Nokki: Nee Odi Indha Vaalibanidaththil Sollavendiyadhu Ennavendraal, Erusalem Than Naduvile Koodum Manusharin Thiralinaalum Mirugajeevangalin Thiralinaalum Madhilillaadha Pattanangalpol Vaasasthalamaagum.
5 naan Adharku Sutrilum Akkini Madhilaayirundhu, Adhin Naduvil Magimaiyaaga Iruppen Endru Karththar Sollugiraar.
6 ogo, Neengal Ezhumbi Vadadhesaththilirundhu Odivaarungal Endru Karththar Sollugiraar; Aagaayaththu Naangu Thisaigalilum Ungalai Naan Sidharappanninen Endru Karththar Sollugiraar.
7 baabilon Kumaaraththiyinidaththil Kudiyirukkira Seeyone, Unnai Viduviththukkol.
8 pirpaadu Magimaiyundaagumendru Senaigalin Karththar Sollugiraar; Ungalaik Kollaiyitta Jaadhigalidaththukku Ennai Anuppinaar; Ungalaith Thodugiravan Avarudaiya Kanmaniyaith Thodugiraan.
9 idho, Naan En Kaiyai Avargalukku Virodhamaaga Asaippen; Adhinaal Avargal Thangal Adimaigalukkuk Kollaiyaavaargal; Appozhudhu Senaigalin Karththar Ennai Anuppinaarendru Ariveergal.
10 seeyon Kumaaraththiye, Gembeeriththuppaadu; Idho, Naan Vandhu Un Naduvil Vaasampannuven Endru Karththar Sollugiraar.
11 annaalile Anegam Jaadhigal Karththarai Serndhu En Janamaavaargal; Naan Un Naduvil Vaasamaayiruppen; Appozhudhu Senaigalin Karththar Ennai Unnidaththil Anuppinaarendru Arivaai.
12 karththar Parisuththa Dhesaththile Yoodhaavaagiya Thamadhu Pangai Sudhandhariththu, Thirumbavum Erusalemaith Therindhukolvaar.
13 maamsamaana Sagalamaana Pergale, Karththarukku Munbaaga Mownamaayirungal; Avar Thamadhu Parisuththa Vaasasthalaththilirundhu Ezhundharulinaar Endru Sol Endraar.
